pages.text: Rafflesia flowers can be found in jungles, and are characterized by a scent almost exactly reminiscent of zombies.$(br2)Given that this smell does not attract any creatures for pollination, it's curious that they do this. Perhaps they are simply ill-tempered?
Stepping on them or otherwise irritating them will cause them to belch a poisonous miasma.$(br2)Pouring a soup made from mushrooms and wildflowers can change the nature of the cloud emitted.
